title: 怎么让用summon召唤出的自定义村民售卖自定义附魔和耐久的装备？
author: TD丶Icy

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-209951-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-209891-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-267647-1-1.html
在村民NBT的id,Damage,Count后面直接加tag:{ench:[id:附魔ID,lvl:附魔等级]}，
修改耐久也一样。

replies.author: jack_lxy
replies.txt_content:

看你的了，总之什么都能办到
